V05n742:2197: tāye dāni śakro 'mara-saṃgha-parivṛtto pāda-vando āgato | āha |
V05n742:2218: apareṇa dāni upāsakena mahārheṇa paṭena chāditā |
V05n742:2232: sā dāni gṛheṇa gṛhaṃ bhāṣaṇāya nīyati |
V05n742:2237: tato 'syāḥ sarvo janakāyo śrotavyaṃ śraddhātavyam manyati |
V05n742:2241: satyaṃ śukle evaṃ nāma tvayā jambhanaṃ śā(sā)dhitaṃ |
V05n742:2249: 146. bhūta-pūrvam atīte 'dhvānaṃ nagare vārāṇasīyaṃ bhagavati kāśyape tatra dāni rājā kṛkī nāmābhūt |
V05n742:2376: tāyo yānād avataritvāna sarvāḥ sapta kumāriyo
V05n742:2428: ko vā tvaṃ kasya vā putraḥ
V05n742:2495: 149.atha bhagavān tāsāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pūrve nivāsa-pratisaṃyuktāṃ pratijñā-kathāṃ vyākārṣīt |
V05n742:2511: evaṃ hy etad bhagavan eṣāpi tatraivāsi |
V05n742:2582: 150. tatra tāsāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ cakṣur gocaraṃ nāsti |
V05n742:2588: tena kālena tena samayena aparā hy etā bhikṣuṇīyo kṛkiṇo rājñaḥ sapta dhītaro abhūṣi |
V05n742:2589: atha śuklā bhikṣuṇī gṛheṇa gṛhaṃ bhāṣaṇāya nīyati |
V05n742:2590: sā dāni apareṇa gṛha-bhāṣaṇāya nītā bhikṣuṇīhi vipravustā |
V05n742:2591: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato ārocayati |
V05n742:2598: evaṃ nāma tvaṃ bhikṣuṇībhir vinā vipravasasi |
V05n742:2599: tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi vinā vipravasituṃ ekāṃ rātrim pi |
V05n742:2604: tahin dāni aparā bhikṣuṇī jarā-durbalā vyādhi-durbalā sārthāt parihīṇā |
V05n742:2608: yāvat mahāprajāpatī pi gautamī bhagavato ārocayati |
V05n742:2617: na kasyacit praveśo dātavyo ti bhagavān prathamaṃ paribhokṣyati |
V05n742:2619: atha rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kośalasya putro virūpa(ḍha)
V05n742:2620: ko nāma kumāraḥ kapilavastuṃ gatako mātulānām antike śikṣāmāṇāya |
V05n742:2621: so dāni tehi rakṣapālehi pramattehi saṃsthāgāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ krīḍanāya |
V05n742:2622: so dāni tehi rakṣapālehi anyehi ca śākiyehi dṛṣṭo |
V05n742:2623: te dāni ruṣitā iti-kitikāya putra dāsī-putra kahiṃ praviṣṭo 'si ti |
V05n742:2625: ekena hastena bāhāyāṃ gṛhītvā dvitīyena hastena grīvāyāṃ saṃsthāgārād bahiś choritaḥ |
V05n742:2627: taṃ dāni tehi śākiyehi saṃsthāgāra puruṣa-mātrā-bhūmiṃ khānāpayitvā navena pāṃsunā pūrayitvā gandhodakena siktaḥ |
V05n742:2631: yady ahaṃ rājyaṃ pratilabheyaṃ śākiyānāṃ nidhanaṃ kariṣye |
V05n742:2635: yadāhaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhito bhaveyaṃ tadā me smārayiṣyasi śākiyānām antam gamiṣyaṃ |
V05n742:2637: kadāci dāni rājā prasenajit kośalo udyāna-bhūmin nirgataḥ |
V05n742:2641: rājā prasenajit kośalo na bhūyaḥ praveśaṃ labhati |
V05n742:2643: yasya bhavanto gṛheṇārthaḥ putra-dāreṇa cārthaḥ sa praviśatu nagaraṃ |
V05n742:2644: evam akriyamāṇe yuṣmākaṃ putra-dāraṃ vyasanam āpādayiṣyāmīti |
V05n742:2649: idānim vā paścād vā etasyaiva etaṃ rājyaṃ gacchatha |
V05n742:2654: udyāna-bhūmīyaṃ saṃsthito pānīyapālo mallī ca rājā dṛṣṭa-satyo na paritasyati |
V05n742:2657: yo dāni bhaṇe rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ jugupseya tasya kiṃ daṇḍaḥ |
V05n742:2661: pūrvam ahaṃ kumāra-bhūtaḥ śākiyānāṃ saṃsthāgāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ tehi mama jugupsāya saṃsthāgāraṃ puruṣa-saṃsthāgāraṃ puruṣa-mātraṃ khānāpayitva pāṃsunā pūrayitvā kṣīra-gandhodakena bhittiyo tāyo [dhovitāyo? ]
V05n742:2662: mayā teṣāṃ vairaṃ pratikartavyaṃ yadi bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ nānukampati |
V05n742:2671: bhagavān dāni virūḍhakasya imam evaṃ rūpaṃ cetaḥ parivitarkam ājñāya kālasai(syai)
V05n742:2676: atha khalu rājā virūḍhako catur-aṅga-bala-kāyaṃ sannāhayitvā hasti-kāyaṃ aśva-kāyaṃ ratha-kāyaṃ patti-kāyaṃ śrāvastyāṃ nagaryāṃ niryāti kapilavastuṃ nagaraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ |
V05n742:2677: adrākṣīd rājā virūḍhako bhagavantaṃ śākhoṭaka-vṛkṣaṃ niśrāya niṣaṇṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca puna yena bhagavāṃs tena hasti-nāgaṃ prerayati |
V05n742:2678: atha khalu rājā virūḍhako yāvad eva yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena gatvā hasti-nāgāt pratyāruhya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantam etad avocat |
V05n742:2680: aśvattha-nyagrodha-saptaparṇādyāḥ śobhanāś ca śītalāś ca tān utsṛjya itarasya pratyavarasya virala-patrasya śākhoṭaka-vṛkṣasyā-dhastān niṣaṇṇaḥ |
V05n742:2683: atha khalu rājño virūḍhakasya etad abhavat |
V05n742:2685: tato yeva pratinivartayitvā śrāvastīn nagaram anupraviṣṭaḥ |
V05n742:2686: bhagavān dāni śrāvastīyaṃ yathābhiramyaṃ viharitvā kapilavastuṃ nagaraṃ prakrāmi |
V05n742:2692: rājā dāni virūḍhako śākīyān vadhitvā śākiya-kanyāyo ādāya śrāvastīṃ pratigataḥ tadyathā |
V05n742:2699: so dāni sārdhaṃ krīḍanto ramanto paricārayantaḥ abhikṣṇaṃ vadati |
V05n742:2704: atha khalv abhayā rāja-dhītā rājānaṃ virūḍhakam etad avocat |
V05n742:2705: mā deva evaṃ vada nihatā me grāmakaṇṭakāḥ śākiyā iti |
V05n742:2715: santi deva śākiyāḥ śrota-āpannāḥ sakṛd-āgāmino nāgāminas te devena a-dūṣakā an-aparā-dhino jīvitād vyavaropitāḥ |
V05n742:2719: 154. atha rājā virūḍhakaḥ kupitaḥ yāvat kāraṇāntikaṃ mahāmātram āmantrayati |
V05n742:2720: tvaṃ hi bhaṇe puruṣa mama bhogehi jāyayasi |
V05n742:2727: tena hi bhaṇe mahā-mātra imāyo śākiyāyinīyo daṇḍa-hatāyo kṛtvā karṇanāsā-hasta-pāda-cchinnāyo kṛtvā taptena te[le]na kāyaṃ pariṣiñcitvā jīvantikāyo evaṃ parikhāyāṃ cchorayā |
V05n742:2729: yan dāni ahaṃ śākiyāyinīnāṃ āsi darśanaṃ pi na labhamāno tāyo etāyo mama hasta-gatāyo yan nūnam aham etāhi saha krīḍeyaṃ rameyaṃ paricārayeyaṃ |
V05n742:2730: so dāni tāhi sārdhaṃ svake gṛhe pravicārayati |
V05n742:2731: aśrauṣīd rājā virūḍhako kāraṇāntikas tāhi sārdhaṃ krīḍati yāvan na ca pi yathoktaṃ karotīti |
V05n742:2737: tāyo tatra duḥkhaṃ tīvrāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti |
V05n742:2745: atha khalu bhagavān kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā pātra-cīvaram ādāya śrāvastīn nagarīṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ |
V05n742:2748: mahato jana-kāyasya nirghoṣo yāvad rājñā virūḍhakena ṣaṇṇāṃ śākiyāyinīnāṃ yāvat tasya kṛpaṇena yāvan sūkta-vādī bhagavān iti krandanti |
V05n742:2749: sādhu bhagavān artha-kāmo jñātīnām anukampyārthaṃ upasaṃkrāmatu |
V05n742:2750: apy eva nāma bhagavataḥ sammukhād dharmaṃ śruṇitvā api svargopigā bhaveṃsuḥ |
V05n742:2751: 155. atha khalu bhagavāṃ śakraṃ devānām indraṃ samanvāharati sma |
V05n742:2752: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ śacim āmantrayati |
V05n742:2753: eṣa śaci bhagavān jñātīnām upasaṃkramati anukampārthaṃ |
V05n742:2754: gaccha śaci tāyo śākiyāyinīyo [parikhāyā] uddharitvā saṃprajānaṃ niṣīdāpehi vastreṇācchādehi bhagavān upasaṃkramiṣyati |
V05n742:2755: atha khalu śacī tāyo śākiyāyinīyo parikhāyā uddharitvā saṃprajānan niṣīdāpayitvā vastreṇācchāditā |
V05n742:2756: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat tāyo-m-aindryā spharitvā yat kiñcit kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ ca duḥkha-vedanā-gataṃ sarvaṃ taṃ pratiprasraṃbheti |
V05n742:2758: tṛpyatāṃ bhikṣavo bhagavatīṣu ko bhikṣavo bhavam abhinandeya ko upādiyeya anyatra bāla-pṛthag-janā-nāṃ andhānāṃ acakṣukānāṃ paśyatha |
V05n742:2759: bhikṣavaḥ etāyo śākiyāyinīyo manuṣyakehi pañcahi kāma-guṇehi krīḍitvā ramitvā pravicārayitvā etarhi jñāti-kṣaye ca bhoga-kṣaye ca karmasya ca sammukhī-bhāvād duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti |
V05n742:2761: sacen manyatha bhaginīyo yad idaṃ yuṣmākaṃ hasto ca pādo ca chinno api tu te vedayanti vā na vā |
V05n742:2764: evaṃ hy etad bhagavan sacen manyatha bhaginīyo cakṣuḥ sva-bhāvaṃ vedayati |
V05n742:2765: yāvad asti ca tat-pratyayā duḥkhā vedanā |
V05n742:2771: evaṃ ca punar duḥkhā vedanā parādhīnā para-pratibaddhā pratyayādhīnā pratyaya-pratibaddhā iti viditvā dvā -triṃśatīhi ākārehi prakṛti -bhinnaḥ |
V05n742:2773: ataś ca bhaginīyo ārya śrāvaka imāṃ (imesāṃ)
V05n742:2777: yāvat tāyo paṭa śākiyāyinīyo dhītāṃ an-āgāmitāṃ sākṣāt kuryuḥ |
V05n742:2778: pañcānāñ ca bhikṣu-śatānam anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimucyeyuḥ |
V05n742:2779: anekeṣāñ ca devatā-śata-sahasrāṇāṃ dharmeṣu dharma-cakṣu viśuddhaṃ |
V05n742:2780: 156. athāyuṣmān vāg-īśas tasyām eva parṣadi yāvad bhagavān āha |
V05n742:2786: śūnyam asāram kañ ca kāyaṃ viditvā
V05n742:2795: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat |
V05n742:2796: kiṃ bhagavann imāhi śākiyāyinīhi purā pāpaṃ karma kṛtam yena etāyo evaṃ duḥkhām vedanām vedayanti |
V05n742:2798: bhūta-pūrvam ānanda etāyo śākiyāyinīyo ihaiva śrāvastyāṃ ṣaḍ gaṇikāyo abhūvan |
V05n742:2799: ihaiva śrāvastīyaṃ kālo nāma pratyeka-bhuddho abhūṣi |
V05n742:2800: so dāni piṇḍāya caranto tāhi gaṇikāhi ukto |
V05n742:2801: ayaṃ dāni śramaṇo svayaṃ kāmān paribhuñjati |
V05n742:2803: tāhi hāsyābhiprāyāhi viheṭhanābhiprāyāhi anyehi dur-uktehi vacana-pathehi obhartsito aṅgāra-mallakehi cāvakīrṇaḥ |
V05n742:2804: so dāni ānanda pratyekabuddho duḥkhāya vedanāya spṛṣṭaḥ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanto kāyena ca jīvitena ca ardiyanto tatraiva vihāya samabhyudgamya an-upādāya parinivṛtaḥ |
V05n742:2805: pūrvādhiṣṭhitena ca svakena tejo-dhātunā tasya śarīraṃ vyāpinaṃ |
V05n742:2806: tāyo dāni gaṇikāyo bhītayo pāpakam asmābhiḥ karmo-pacitaṃ |
V05n742:2815: an-āgatam adhvānam vayam etādṛśaṃ śāstāram ārāgayemaḥ |
V05n742:2818: tāyo etāyo tena pāpena karmeṇa kṛtena yāvan narakeṣūpapannāyo etāyo tahiṃ bahūni varṣa-sahasrāṇi duḥkham anubhaveṃsuḥ |
V05n742:2819: etāhi ānanda bāla-pṛthag-janāhi hasantīhi pāpa-karma kṛtaṃ |
V05n742:2821: yam etāhi sā pūjā kṛtā vipratisāraś cotpāditaḥ |
V05n742:2822: yaṃ ca praṇidhānaṃ an-āgatam adhvānaṃ etādṛśaṃ śastāram ārāgayemaḥ |
V05n742:2825: yāvat pañcānām avara-bhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ yāvat tatra parinirvāyinyaḥ |
V05n742:2829: tasmāt tvam ānanda imaṃ dharma-paryāyaṃ kāraṇa-vaipulyan nāma dhāraya idam avocat |
V05n742:2831: kāścid anto nagare nilīnāḥ kāścid bahir nirgatāḥ |
V05n742:2848: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:2849: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
V05n742:2850: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā ekarātram pi vipravaseya anyatra-samayena |
V05n742:2856: ekaṃ rātram pi vipravaseyā ti aruṇa-m-udagame ca anyatra-samaye |
V05n742:2858: jarā-burbalā vā vyādhi-durbalā vā nagaro[paro]dho vā |
V05n742:2860: kiñcāpi bhikṣuṇī anto nagarato bahirdhā nirdhāvati bahirdhāto vā anto nagaraṃ praviśati |
V05n742:2862: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī sa-sūrye vinā bhūtā bhikṣuṇīhi vipravustā aruṇa-m-udghāteti saṃghātiśeṣo |
V05n742:2865: bhikṣuṇī-vihāre anyatra vā sarvāhi anto hasta-pāśasya pratikramitavyaṃ |
V05n742:2869: atha khalu yāme yāme purime yāme samavadhānaṃ na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
V05n742:2870: madhyame yāme na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
V05n742:2871: paścime yāme na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
V05n742:2873: atha dāni dvi-bhūmakaṃ bhavati ekā heṣṭhime pratikramati aparā uparime |
V05n742:2876: yā puna[bhikṣuṇī] bhikṣuṇībhi vinā eka-rātram pi vipravasiya anyatra-samaye |
V05n742:2878: nagaro parodhe vā ruddhā bhavati ayam atra samayo |
V05n742:2882: rājagṛhe dāni aparasya abhaṭa-gaṇasya sudinnikā nāma bhāryā taruṇī |
V05n742:2896: taṃhi dāni kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī prativasati |
V05n742:2911: so dāni puruṣo anupūrveṇa śrāvastīṃ gatvā pṛcchati |
V05n742:2915: pṛcchati yāvād āha katamā āryā kālīti sā dān āha |
V05n742:2918: prāpta-kālan nāma āryāye mama bhāryām an-otsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājayituṃ |
V05n742:2926: ānetha saṃghāṭiṃ yāvad imaṃ caḍāyudherāṭikaṃ (caṇḍāyuṃ dhare cāṭikaṃ )
V05n742:2929: yāvad iyaṃ śramaṇikā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca bandhāpayeya iti |
V05n742:2930: so manuṣyo ojjhāyati ca osakkati ca yāvad bahir gatvā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mahārājānasyā (mahājana-kāyasyā)rocayati |
V05n742:2931: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā bhāryām ca me an-otsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājayati mama ca bhandhanena santarjeti |
V05n742:2932: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayanti |
V05n742:2941: evan nāma tvaṃ anujñāpakehi an-anujñātām upasthāpayasi |
V05n742:2942: tena hi na kṣamati anujñāpakehi an-anujñātām upasthāpayituṃ |
V05n742:2944: paśya bhagavan katham iyaṃ kālīya pratyu[tpa]nna-pratibhānatāya mocitā |
V05n742:2947: na ceṣā bhikṣuṇīyo kālīya etarhy eva pratyutpanna-pratibhānatāya mocitā |
V05n742:2951: bhūta-pūrvaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo iyam eva nagarī vārāṇasī |
V05n742:2952: iyaṃ strī rātrau dārikāṃ skandhenādāya gacchati |
V05n742:2955: tāya striyāya sā dārikā capeṭāya āhatā |
V05n742:2956: eko te siṃho khādito etam pi khāditu-kāmāsi |
V05n742:2958: yādṛśī eṣā strī dhvāṃkṣā ca mukharā ca khādaty |
V05n742:2977: sā strī jalpati mā rodāhi dāriko(ke) |
V05n742:2978: eṣo tava mātuḥ kenānīto keśehi gṛhītvā |
V05n742:2979: idāniṃ yan naṃ icchasi taṃ se khādāhīti |
V05n742:2984: yat tāvad ahaṃ ekaṃ vāraṃ prapalī(lā)
V05n742:2986: so dāni tasya markaṭasya avadhunitvā prapalānaḥ |
V05n742:2993: syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyā sā strī abhūṣi |
V05n742:2995: iyam eva sā kālī strī abhūṣi |
V05n742:2996: syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyā sā dārikā ti |
V05n742:2998: iyam eva sā sudinnikā dārikā abhūṣi |
V05n742:2999: syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyo so siṃho abhūṣīti |
V05n742:3004: 159. atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:3005: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat pa[rya]vadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
V05n742:3006: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi an-anujñātām upasthāpayed ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko saṃghātiśeṣo |
V05n742:3008: anujñāpakehi an-anujñātām iti avūḍhāya dārikāya mātā-pitarau anujñāpakā |
V05n742:3011: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi an-anujñātām pravrājayati vinayātikramam āsādyati |
V05n742:3013: upasaṃpādeti saṃghātiśeṣo eṣā kācit pravrajyāpekṣā āgacchati praṣṭavyā |
V05n742:3021: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi an-anujñātām upasthāpayed ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko saṃghātiśeṣo |
V05n742:3026: taṃhi dāni aparasya mallasya bhāryā para-puruṣeṇa sārdham abhicarati |
V05n742:3030: 'to mā te aham evañ ca evañ ca asat kariṣyaṃ |
V05n742:3033: na punar aham ato doṣato viramiṣyaṃ |
V05n742:3034: tena sā sahoḍhaṃ gṛhītvā āsane upanāmitā |
V05n742:3035: iccheyam ahaṃ bhavanto imāṃ sva-dharmeṇa lambhiyamānāṃ |
V05n742:3037: yā strī anyena puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ abhicarati |
V05n742:3038: sā sapta-divasāni dāna-visargaṃ kārapetvā ubhayato jñāti-saṃghasya purato gopāṭikām (kāya) pāṭīyati |
V05n742:3041: tena dāni puruṣeṇa gṛhaṃ nayitvā uktā |
V05n742:3042: iti-kitikāya dhīte dada yat te asti ca nāsti ca |
V05n742:3043: sapta divasāni ahaṃ te ubhayato jñāti-saṃghasya purato go-pāṭikāya pāṭayiṣyaṃ |
V05n742:3044: sā dāni ubhayato jñāti-saṃghaṃ sannipātetvā annaṃ pānaṃ khādyaṃ bhojyaṃ samudānīya rodati |
V05n742:3046: kiṃ ruditena tvayaiva tathā ceṣṭitaṃ yena tvam evaṃ duḥkham anubhaviṣyasi |
V05n742:3050: api tu ubhayato jñāti-saṃghasya purato go-pāṭikāya pāṭayiṣyan ti |
V05n742:3060: sā tasyā vacanaṃ śrutvā janasya khādyantasya pibantasya pramattasya yathā vā tathā vā nirdhāvitvā anupūrveṇa pṛccha-pṛcchikāya śrāvastīm āgatā |
V05n742:3081: putriṇi yā tvaṃ nisṛṣṭā su-nisṛṣṭā yā tvaṃ go-pāṭikāyāṃ nisṛṣṭā |
V05n742:3095: prāptan nāmāryāya mama bhāryām an-otsṛṣṭām pravrājayituṃ |
V05n742:3101: caṇḍāyu coras tvam ocorakas tvam ocaritu-kāmo tvaṃ śrāvastīyaṃ praviṣṭaḥ |
V05n742:3102: na tvaṃ jānāsi nityaviruddhāḥ śrāvasteyāḥ āmalaka-kalyāś ca |
V05n742:3104: ānehi tāva samaghāṭim yāvad imaṃ caṇḍāyu(yuṃ)
V05n742:3107: yādṛśī iyaṃ śramaṇikā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca pragalbhā ca |
V05n742:3109: eṣa so dāni puruṣo ojjhāyati ca osakkati ca |
V05n742:3110: so dāni puruṣo bhikṣuṇī nāṃ [mahājana-kāyasya ca puro ojjhāyati |
V05n742:3111: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā bhāryāñ ca me an-otsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājeti |
V05n742:3113: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayanti |
V05n742:3116: evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñāti-daṇḍa-prāptām upasthāpayasi |
V05n742:3117: tena hi na kṣamati jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñāti-daṇḍa-prāptām upasthāpayituṃ |
V05n742:3121: yāvad anyā tāva mayā īdṛśī yeva pravrājitā |
V05n742:3124: sā dāni aparāparāsāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām allīnā na kācit pravrājeti |
V05n742:3131: idānīṃ sā iti-kitikāya dhītā su-mahatā dṛṣṭadhārmikena ca vadhena |
V05n742:3133: so punar na gaveṣati na pṛcchati |
V05n742:3134: sā pi dāni tena tīrthika-bhāvena tīrthika-bhāvenārtīyati |
V05n742:3138: nagnā a-hrīkā an-otrāpiṇo istri-kāmā pi dūṣenti |
V05n742:3140: moha bhāginī asmākaṃ pravrajyā gartasmi patitā |
V05n742:3154: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:3156: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñāti-daṇḍa-prāptām upasthāpayed anyatra samaye |
V05n742:3160: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya |
V05n742:3162: viditān ti ubhayato jñāti-saṃghasya mātṛ-pakṣasya pitṛ-pakṣasya ca |
V05n742:3164: jñātayo nāma kṣatriyāṅ brāhmaṇāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ ambaṣṭha-vaidehāḥ bhaṭanāḥ kuṃkumālāḥ |
V05n742:3166: keṣāñcit kīṭena vā kāliñjena vā veṭhayitvā dahyati |
V05n742:3167: keṣāñcit vālukā-ghaṭakaṃ kaṇṭhe badhvā udake praveśiyati |
V05n742:3170: keṣāñcit taptaṃ phālaṃ vraṇa-mukhe anuśrotaṃ prakṣipīyati |
V05n742:3172: kṣatriyāṇāṃ palālena śarehi ca veṭhayitvā dahyati |
V05n742:3173: abhīrāṇām vālukāya ghaṭaṃ kaṇṭhe bhadhvā udake prakṣipati |
V05n742:3176: taptam vā phālaṃ anuśrote vraṇa-mukhe prakṣipīyanti |
V05n742:3178: anyatra samaye ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ an-āpattiḥ |
V05n742:3182: caraka-parivrājaka-nirgranthājīvaka-tre-daṇḍikāḥ mākandikāḥ gudugudukāḥ gautama-dharma-cintakāḥ vṛddha-śrāvakaḥ daka-tṛtīyakāḥ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
V05n742:3183: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñāti -daṇḍa-prāptāṃ pravrajayati vinayāti-kramam āsādayati |
V05n742:3187: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñāti-daṇḍa-prāptām upasthāpayet |
V05n742:3195: atha saṃbahulā striyo nadīyam ajirāvatīyaṃ snāyanti |
V05n742:3197: sā tāvad ekānte cīvarakāṇi nikṣipya bāhubhyāṃ pratīrṇā |
V05n742:3200: sā kayadhānake muhūrtam viśramitvā punar evāgatā |
V05n742:3208: mahāprajāpatī gautami bhagavato āroceti yāvad bhagavān āha |
V05n742:3210: evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ ekākinī nadīṃ tarasi |
V05n742:3211: tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tarituṃ |
V05n742:3212: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:3213: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
V05n742:3214: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tare ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko |
V05n742:3217: nadīti yā bahiḥ sīmāto pravahantī bahiḥ sīmām upeti |
V05n742:3220: yāvatā ca etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo nadīn taranti anto hastapāśe taritavyaṃ |
V05n742:3223: atha-vaikā madhye tiṣṭhati aparā taranti thūl'-accayaṃ |
V05n742:3224: yāvad evam aparāparanti sarvāḥ thūl'-accayam āsādayanti |
V05n742:3225: etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo nadyāṃ snāyanti ante hasta-pāśena snātavyaḥ (vyaṃ) |
V05n742:3228: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tareya |
V05n742:3233: tahiṃ kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī grāma-cārikāṃ gatā |
V05n742:3234: tasyā gatāya antevāsinīye bhikṣuṇī-saṃghena utkṣepanīya-karma kṛtaṃ |
V05n742:3243: sā dāni anyadā cānyadā ca yadā grāmacārikāṃ caritvā āgatā bhavati |
V05n742:3245: tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo sannipatathety uktā śīghraṃ śīghraṃ sannipatitāḥ kiñcid vaibhaṅgikaṃ dāsyatīti |
V05n742:3250: yadi saṃghasya prāpta-kālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ pratyosareya |
V05n742:3256: yasyā āryamiśrikānāṃ kṣamati itthan-nāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ pratyosāryamāṇāṃ saṃghena sā tūṣṇīm asya yasyā na kṣamati sā bhāṣetu |
V05n742:3258: evaṃ trai-vācikaṃ pratyosāritā ārya-miśrikā iyam itthan-nāmā bhikṣuṇī |
V05n742:3260: kṣamati taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi |
V05n742:3261: atha sā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā śca(ca)
V05n742:3267: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇyo mahāprajāpatyā gautamyā ārocayeyuḥ |
V05n742:3275: duṣkṛtaṃ te kāli evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptām a-pratikṛtāṃ |
V05n742:3280: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:3282: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṃ a-pratikṛtāṃ |
V05n742:3287: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti upasampannā yāvad ubhayataḥ saṃghena |
V05n742:3298: akṛtvā pūrva-kṛtyaṃ ti prakṛti-sthā bhikṣuṇīyo a-saṃjñāpayitvā |
V05n742:3300: saṃgha-madhye avalokanām akṛtvā svayam eva pratyosārayet |
V05n742:3302: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī jānan[tī] bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṃ |
V05n742:3307: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī samagreṇa saṃghena utkṣiptā bhavati |
V05n742:3308: yā tasyā upādhyāyī vā ācāryāyiṇī vā ca yā prakṛti-sthā bhikṣuṇyāḥ tā saṃjñāpayitavyāḥ |
V05n742:3318: tasyāḥ saṃghena amukasmin vastuni utkṣepanīyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ |
V05n742:3322: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgham itthan-nāmā pratyosāraṇāṃ yāceya |
V05n742:3328: atha tatra kācit pṛatihati karma-kriyamāṇe prakṛtisthābhir bhikṣuṇībhiḥ saṃjñāpayitavyāḥ |
V05n742:3330: bhikṣur api jānan bhikṣuṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptaṃ svayam eva pratyosārayati sthūlātyayam āsādayati |
V05n742:3332: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānan[ti] bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṃ a-pratikṛtāṃ a-kṛtāṃ [a]kṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ an-avalokayitvā bhikṣuṇī-saṃghasyeyam eva (-saṃghaṃ svayam eva)
V05n742:3352: ayaṃ tv aham āryāya arthikaḥ āryāya dadāmi |
V05n742:3356: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇyo mahaprajāpatyā gautamyā ārocayeyuḥ |
V05n742:3365: nanu te paścimā nāma janatā avalokayitavyā |
V05n742:3367: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:3369: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī an-avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya pratigṛhṇīyāt pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā bhakṣyaṃ [vā] bhojyaṃ vā glāna-pratyaya-bhaiṣajya-pariṣkāraṃ vā ayam api dharmaḥ |
V05n742:3370: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti yāvad upasampannā ubhayataḥ saṃghena |
V05n742:3374: pātram iti jyeṣṭhaṃ madhyamaṃ kanyasam vā |
V05n742:3378: antaśaḥ glāna-bhaiṣajyam iti saptāhikaṃ vā yāvaj-jīvikam vā |
V05n742:3381: eṣo tāvan manuṣyo bhikṣuṇīya dadāti pātram vā cīvaram |
V05n742:3389: tavaiva bhavatu dīrghāyuḥ labhiṣyāmaḥ vayam anyato pi |
V05n742:3391: atha vācaṃ na bhāṣati hasta-vikāraṃ vā pāda-vikāraṃ vā akṣi-vikāraṃ vā karoti |
V05n742:3398: atha khalu denaṃ deti prasannair indriyaiḥ |
V05n742:3399: atha khalu tayā bhikṣuṇyā āśayena pratīcchitavyaṃ pratīcchati an-āpattiḥ |
V05n742:3400: evaṃ bhikṣor api rakta-cittā strī dadāti |
V05n742:3406: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya pātram cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glāna-bhaiṣajyam vā pratigṛhṇeya [aya]m api dharmo prathamāpattiko |
V05n742:3410: na kṣamati avaśrutasya puruṣasya pātraṃ vā yāvat pratigṛhṇātuṃ |
V05n742:3411: sā jetā tasya puruṣasya na praticchati |
V05n742:3420: mā ārye etāṃ bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vada |
V05n742:3422: kin te paro kariṣyati avaśruto vā anavaśruto vā |
V05n742:3426: dvitīyam tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramati |
V05n742:3427: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇyo mahāprajāpatyā gautamyā ārocayanti |
V05n742:3434: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:3436: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīṃ evaṃ vadeya |
V05n742:3442: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhiḥ ucyamānā etad eva vastuṃ pratigṛhya tiṣtheya na pratinissaret |
V05n742:3443: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etat kuśalaṃ |
V05n742:3446: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī |
V05n742:3447: tāṃ bhikṣuṇīm iti yathā tāṃ ye(je)tāṃ |
V05n742:3451: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tad evaṃ vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya |
V05n742:3452: ayam api dharmo yāvat tṛtīyakaḥ yathā bhikṣu-vinaye |
V05n742:3456: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vadeya |
V05n742:3458: kiṃ te paro kariṣyati avaśruto vā an-avaśruto vā |
V05n742:3461: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā |
V05n742:3462: mā ārye etāṃ bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vade |
V05n742:3464: kin te paro kariṣyati avaśruto vā an-avaśruto vā |
V05n742:3467: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya |
V05n742:3469: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanuśāsitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya |
V05n742:3470: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhyamāṇā samanubhāṣyamāṇā tam vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etat kuśalaṃ |
V05n742:3471: no ca pratiniḥsareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya |
V05n742:3475: dvau bhedena tathaiva kartavyo yāvat tena bhagavān āha |
V05n742:3476: yā puna bhikṣuṇī samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrameya bhedana-samvartanīyaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya |
V05n742:3477: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā |
V05n742:3478: mā ārye samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrameya |
V05n742:3479: bhedana-samvartanīyam vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭhāhi |
V05n742:3481: samagro hi saṃgho sahito sammodayamāna avivadamāno |
V05n742:3482: ek' uddeśo kṣīrodakī-bhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamānaḥ sukhañ ca phāsuñ ca viharati |
V05n742:3483: evaṃ ca sā [bhikṣuṇī] bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya |
V05n742:3485: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya |
V05n742:3486: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsareya |
V05n742:3490: tasyāḥ khalu bhikṣuṇyā bhikṣuṇyo bhavanti sahāyikā |
V05n742:3491: ekā vā dvau vā trayo vā saṃbahulā vā |
V05n742:3494: mā āryamiśrikāḥ etāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ kiñcid avavadittha |
V05n742:3496: dharma-vādinī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī vinaya-vādinī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī |
V05n742:3497: asmākaṃ caiṣā bhikṣuṇī chandañ ca ruciṃ ca sam-ādāya pragṛhya vyavaharati |
V05n742:3498: yañ caitasyāḥ bhikṣuṇyāḥ kṣamate ca rocate ca asmākam api taṃ kṣamate ca rocate ca |
V05n742:3499: jānantī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī bhāṣate no a-jānanti |
V05n742:3500: tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyāḥ |
V05n742:3507: sahito sammodayamāno a-vivadamāno ek'-uddeśo kṣīrodakī-bhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamānaḥ |
V05n742:3509: evañ ca tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhiḥ ucyamānā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ ity etat kuśalaṃ |
V05n742:3510: no ce pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhiḥ yāvat-tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastu[sya] pratiniḥsargāya |
V05n742:3511: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ ity etat kuśalaṃ |
V05n742:3513: tad eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheyuḥ |
V05n742:3518: tatra sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī adhikaraṇāny utpādayati |
V05n742:3520: sā saṃghaṃ ākrośati saṃgham a-gati-gamanena prāpayati |
V05n742:3534: yāvan na mohan niśrāya yāvad āryā evaṃ chanda-gāmī |
V05n742:3535: mā ārye chandan niśrāya saṃgham ākroṣitavyam manyasi paribhāṣitavyam manyasi |

V05n742:3543: satyaṃ tvam ārye nande saṃgham a-gati-gamanena prāpayati (si) |
V05n742:3544: alam ārye nande saṃgham a-gati-gamanena prāpayituṃ |
V05n742:3545: yāvat khalu te ārye mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ artha-kāmāya hitaiṣiṇīya karoti |
V05n742:3550: satyaṃ tvam ārye nande saṃgham a-gati-gamanena prāpayasi |
V05n742:3553: sā tāva saṃgha-madhye pi vaktavyā peyālaṃ |
V05n742:3555: anubhāṣṭā bhagavan āryā nandā triṣkṛtvā kuv-ege triṣkṛtvā ma[hā-ja]ne triṣkṛtvā saṃghamadhye etasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya |
V05n742:3564: nanv ahaṃ nande aneka-paryāyeṇa daurvacasyaṃ vigarhāmi yāvan naivaṃ kurvato vṛddhir bhavati kūśaleṣu dharmeṣu atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:3579: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā |

V05n742:3589: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamāna tad eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya |
V05n742:3590: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣūṇībhiḥ yāvat-tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratinissargāya |
V05n742:3591: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamānā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etat kuślaṃ |
V05n742:3594: yāvad eṣā bhikṣuṇī triṣkṛtvā kuv-ege samanugrāhiyamānā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsarati |
V05n742:3596: evaṃ mahājane saṃgha-madhye jñaptim adhivāsayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |

V05n742:3604: sthūlātyayāḥ sarve te pratiprasrabhyanti sthāpayitvā aṣṭau sthūlātyayāḥ |
V05n742:3607: kathaṃ tāvat pratiniḥ sargārhaṃ katham a-pratiniḥsargārhaṃ |
V05n742:3608: abhūṣi me saṃgham a-gati-gamanena prāpayiṣyan ti prāpayāmi prāpayiṣyāmi ceti evaṃ pratiniḥsargārhaṃ |
V05n742:3610: abhūṣi me saṃgham a-gatigamanena prāpayiṣyan ti prāpitañ ca |
V05n742:3611: na khalv idānīṃ prāpayāmi na ca prāpayiṣyāmīty a-pratiniḥsargārhaṃ |
V05n742:3617: saṃgho doṣa-gāmī ca bhaya-gāmī ca saṃgho |
V05n742:3619: chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohaṃ niśrāya samākrośitavyām paribhāṣitavyām manyati |
V05n742:3620: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā |
V05n742:3626: na ca saṃgho chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohaṃ niśrāya āryām ākrośitavyām paribhāṣitavyām manyati |
V05n742:3627: āryā evaṃ chanda-gāminī doṣa-gāminī bhaya-gāminī mohagāminī |
V05n742:3628: āryā eva chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohan niśrāya saṃegham ākrośitavyaṃ roṣitavyaṃ paribhāṣitavyaṃ manyati |
V05n742:3630: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tam evi vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭhet |
V05n742:3632: sā bhikṣuṇ bhikṣunībhir yāvat-tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya |
V05n742:3634: taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etat skaṇaṃ (kuśalaṃ) |
V05n742:3641: sā uddeśa-paryavasānehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣuṇīhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamānā |
V05n742:3646: sā uddeśa-paryāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣuṇīhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamānā ātmānam a-vacanīyaṃ karoti |
V05n742:3648: mā me āryamiśrikāyo kiñcid vadatha kalyāṇam vā pāpakaṃ vā |
V05n742:3649: aham apy āryamiśrikāṇān na kiñcid vakṣyāmi kalyāṇam vā pāpakam vā |
V05n742:3651: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā |
V05n742:3652: mā ārye uddeśa-paryāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣuṇīhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamānā ātmānam a-vacanīyaṃ karohi |
V05n742:3654: āryā pi bhikṣuṇīyo vadantu śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena |
V05n742:3655: āryam api bhikṣuṇīyo vakṣyanti śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena |
V05n742:3656: evaṃ saṃvṛddhā khalu punar ārye tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya parṣā yad idam anyamanya-vacanīyā anyamanyāpatti-vyutthāpanīyā |
V05n742:3657: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya |
V05n742:3659: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya |
V05n742:3660: yāvāt-tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇa vā tam vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ |
V05n742:3661: no ca pratiniḥsareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya |
V05n742:3665: etā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo nandā ca śākya-kanyā uttarā ca māsoraka-dhītā kāyikena saṃsargeṇa saṃsṛṣṭā hi viharanti |

V05n742:3679: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramanti |
V05n742:3680: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tā bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:3683: bhikṣuṇī[yo] khalu punar dve saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti |
V05n742:3685: tā bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā |
V05n742:3688: nānā vo viharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṃkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi |
V05n742:3690: evaṃ ca tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānās taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsuḥ |

V05n742:3693: yāvat-tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsuḥ itya etaṃ kuśalaṃ |
V05n742:3694: no ca pratinissareṃsuḥ tam evam vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheṃsuḥ |
V05n742:3696: bhikṣuṇīyo khalu puna dve saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti yathā nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśoraka-dhītā |
V05n742:3699: tā bhikṣuṇīyo yathā nandā ca śākya-kanyā uttarā ca māśoraka-dhītā |
V05n742:3705: yāvat tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheṃsuḥ |
V05n742:3706: yaṃ taṃ vastuṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti anyamanyasyāvadyāni praticchā[da]yanti |
V05n742:3707: tā bhikṣuṇīyo ti yathā nandā ca śākya-kanyā uttarā ca māśoraka-dhitā |
V05n742:3708: bhikṣuṇīhīti saṃghena mahā-janena eka-pudgalena yāvat-tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā |
V05n742:3709: trikkhutto kuvege trikkhutto mahā-jane trikkhutto saṃgha-madhye samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya |
V05n742:3710: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ |
V05n742:3711: no ca pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ ayam api dharmo yāvat tṛtīyako saṃghātiśeṣo |
V05n742:3714: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī trikkhatto kuv-ege samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastun na pratiniḥsarati vācāyāṃ vācāyāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati |
V05n742:3715: evaṃ mahā-jane saṃgha-madhye jñaptim adhivāsayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
V05n742:3718: evaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ vācāyām adhyoropitāyāṃ thūl'-accayaṃ |
V05n742:3727: abhūṣi khalu mo saṃsṛṣṭā vihariṣyāmo anyonyasyāvadya-praticchādikā ti te dānīm viharāmo vihariṣyāmo na vihṛtaṃ |
V05n742:3730: bhikṣuṇīyo khalu puna dve saṃsṛṣṭāyo viharanti anyonyasyā-vadya-praticchādikā |
V05n742:3737: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi saṃsṛṣṭā viharitun ti |
V05n742:3738: nandā ca śākya-kanyā uttarā ca māśoraka-dhītā bhikṣuṇīyo nānā viharanti |
V05n742:3742: tāsāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ vo viharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṃkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi |

V05n742:3754: evaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramati |
V05n742:3755: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti |
V05n742:3758: yady eṣā sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī nandāṃ śākyakanyāṃ uttarāṃ ca māśoraka-dhītām evam āha |

V05n742:3763: tena hi gacchatha naṃtrikkhatto kuv-ege trikkhatto mahā-jane trikkhatto saṃgha-madhye samanugrāhayatha samanubhāṣatha etasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya |
V05n742:3765: satyaṃ tvam ārye nande etā bhikṣuṇīyo evam vadasi yāvad āmo ty āha |
V05n742:3767: mā ārye nande etā bhikṣuṇīyo evaṃ vada |

V05n742:3770: taṃ mitrā ekā vācā gacchati dve vācā avaśiṣṭā pratiniḥsarāmity āha |

V05n742:3791: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā |

V05n742:3892: sā [tvaṃ] kuv-ege vuccasi mā tvam ārye itthan-nāme buddhaṃ pratyākhyāhi yāvac chākya-putrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāhi |
V05n742:3895: yaṃ khalu te ārye itthan-nāmāya mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ arthakāmāya hitaiṣīṇīye karoti |
V05n742:3900: evaṃ mahā-jane saṃgha-madhye avalokanā kartavyā yāvad etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo bhagavato ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:3909: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:3914: dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śikṣām uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ saṃbhogaṃ śāstṛ-padaṃ bhikṣuṇī-bhāvaṃ śramaṇī-bhāvaṃ śākya-putrīyabhāvaṃ pratyākhyāmi |
V05n742:3918: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā |
V05n742:3921: mā dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śikṣām uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ saṃbhogaṃ śāstṛ-padaṃ bhikṣuṇī-bhāvaṃ śramaṇi-bhāvaṃ śākya-putrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāhi |
V05n742:3927: evañ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya na pratiniḥsareya |
V05n742:3928: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya |
V05n742:3929: yāvat -tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ |
V05n742:3933: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti yathā sā bhikṣuṇī |
V05n742:3934: śikṣā-pratyākhyāyikā ti sā evam āha buddhaṃ pratyākhyāmi |
V05n742:3940: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā |
V05n742:3941: mā ārye buddhaṃ praytākhyāhi yāvad asādhu ārye śākya-putrīya bhāva-pratyākhyānaṃ |
V05n742:3942: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya na pratiniḥsareya |
V05n742:3944: sā bhikṣuṇīhīti saṃghena mahā-janena eka-pudgalena yāvat-tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā trikkhatto kuv-ege trikkhatto mahā-jane trikkhato saṃghamadhye |
V05n742:3946: satyaṃ tvam itthan-nāme evaṃ vadasi buddhaṃ pratyākhyāmi yāvac chākya-putrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāmi |
V05n742:3951: yaṃ khalu te ārye itthannāmāya mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ |
V05n742:3954: dve vācā avaśiṣṭā pratiniḥsara na pratiniḥsarāmīty āha |
V05n742:3957: yāvat-tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity ete(taṃ) kuśalaṃ |
V05n742:3958: no ca pratiniḥsareya ayam api dharmo yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
V05n742:3959: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī trikkhatto kuv-ege trikkhatto mahā-jane trikkhatto saṃgha-madhye samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsarati vācāyāṃ vācāyāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati |
V05n742:3960: evaṃ mahā-jane saṃgha-madhye jñaptim adhivāsayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
V05n742:3963: evaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ vācāyām adhyoropitāyāṃ thūl'-accayam |
V05n742:3965: yadā saṃghātiṣeśam āpattim āpannā bhavati tadā ye ca kuv-ege ye ca mahā-jane ye ca saṃgha-madhye thūl'-accayā ca vinayātikramā ca sarve te pratiprasrabhyante |
V05n742:3966: ekā gurukā āpattiḥ saṃsthihati yad idaṃ saṃghātiśeṣo |
V05n742:3968: kin ti dāni pratiniḥsargārhaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ kim apratiniḥsargārhaṃ |
V05n742:3970: na khalu me pratyākhyānaṃ prtiniḥsargārhaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ |
V05n742:3972: abhūṣi khalu me śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāsyan ti |
V05n742:3973: pratyākhyātam dāni na pratyākhyāsi pratyākhyāmi ceti |
V05n742:3981: uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ saṃbhogaṃ śāstṛ-padaṃ bhikṣuṇī-bhāvaṃ [śramaṇī-bhāvaṃ] śākya-putrī[ya] bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāti (mi) |
V05n742:3985: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā |
V05n742:3990: mā uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ sambhogaṃ śāstṛ-padaṃ bhikṣuṇī-bhāvaṃ śramaṇī-bhāvaṃ śākya-putrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāhi |
V05n742:3998: evaṃ ca sā [bhikṣuṇī] bhikṣuṇīhi vuccamānā taṃ eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya |
V05n742:4000: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvat-tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya |

V05n742:4006: uddiṣṭā me āryamiśrikāyo ekūnaviṃśati saṃghātiśeṣā dharmāḥ |
V05n742:4010: m āpattim āpadyitvā ardha-māsaṃ ubhayato saṃghe mānatvaṃ [ca]ritavyaṃ |
V05n742:4012: āhvayana-pratibaddhā yatra syād viṃśati-gaṇo ubhayato saṃgho tatra sā bhikṣuṇī āhvayitavyā |
V05n742:4013: ekenāpi ced ūnoviṃśati-gaṇo ubhayato saṃgho tāṃ bhikṣuṇīm āhveya |
V05n742:4015: te ca bhikṣavo tāś ca bhikṣuṇīyo garhyāḥ |
V05n742:4022: pariśuddhā atrāryamiśrikāyo yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etan dhārayāmi | uddānaṃ |
V05n742:4054: tā dāni striyo kācin māñcasya mūlyan deti(denti) |
V05n742:4061: āryāye nandāye mayā mañcasya mūlyaṃ dattaṃ |
V05n742:4065: khādati ca pibati ca pātraṃ ca jānāpeti |
V05n742:4068: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:4074: satyaṃ tvaṃ nande śayyāsanasyārthāya yācitvā anyaṃ cetāpeti |
V05n742:4082: atha khalu bhagavān mahā-prajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:4084: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śayyāsanasyārthāya yācayitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhaktam vā bhojyam vā glāna-bhaiṣajyam vā cetāpayen nissargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4087: śayyāsanaṃ nāma mañcaṃ pīṭhaṃ bisi caturasraṃ kuccaṃ bimbohanaṃ |
V05n742:4090: pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā cetāpayen nissargikapācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4098: tam vastuṃ na darśeti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
V05n742:4099: khaṇḍa(ḍaṃ) pralugnaṃ vā vā lepanikām vā kartuṃ kumbhiyo upasthāpayituṃ bhikṣur api śayanāsanasyārthāya yācayitvā anyaṃ cetāpeti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
V05n742:4100: vastun darśetvā labhyaṃ khaṇḍaṃ pralugnādi kartuṃ |
V05n742:4102: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śayyāsanasyārthāya yācitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glāna-bhaiṣajyaṃ vā cetāpaye niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ ||
V05n742:4106: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī omalina-malinehi cīvarehi pāṭita-vipāṭitehi khaṇḍena pātreṇa chidra-vichidreṇa piṇḍapātam aṇvanti(vati) |
V05n742:4112: ahan te ārye pātrasya mūlyaṃ demi |
V05n742:4120: sā khādati ca pibati ca naiva pātraṃ na cīvaraṃ jānāpeti |
V05n742:4123: mayā āryāye nandāye pātrasya mūlyan dattaṃ |
V05n742:4128: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti |
V05n742:4133: satyaṃ nande evan nāma tvaṃ nande anyoddeśikenānyaṃ cetāpayasi |
V05n742:4137: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvad evaṃ nāma tvam anyoddeśikena anyaṃ cetāpayasi |
V05n742:4138: tena hi na kṣamati anyoddeśikenānyaṃ cetāpayituṃ |
V05n742:4139: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:4140: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyoddeśikena anyaṃ cetāpayet niḥsargikapācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4144: anyaṃ cetāpayed iti bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4146: eṣo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo kācit pātram vā cīvaram vā ghṛtam vā tailam vā cetāpayituṃ mūlyan deti |
V05n742:4151: atha a-niyataṃ deti yaṃ icchati taṃ jā[nā]peti an-āpattiḥ |
V05n742:4155: bhikṣavor apy evam eva āpattis tu vinayātikaramaḥ |
V05n742:4157: yam vā icchasi taṃ gṛhṇāhīti taṃ gṛhṇāti an-āpattiḥ |
V05n742:4159: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyoddeśakenānyaṃ cetāpayati niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4163: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī saṃghasya bhaktakāni samādāyeti |
V05n742:4167: tā dāni striyo chandakaṃ prajantīntīyo jalpanti |
V05n742:4171: atha sā khādati ca pibati ca pātraṃ ca jānāpeti |
V05n742:4172: tāya khāditāvaśeṣeṇa yādṛśaṃ vā bhaktaṃ kṛtaṃ |
V05n742:4182: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:4187: satyaṃ nande evan-nāma tvam anyeṣām arthāya yācitvā anyaṃ cetāpayasi |
V05n742:4191: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajapatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:4192: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
V05n742:4193: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glāna-pratyaya-bhaiṣajya-pariṣkārān vā cetāpayati |
V05n742:4197: anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā saṃghasya bhaktasya vā tarpaṇasya vā yvāgū-pānasya vā yācitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhaktam vā bhojyam vā glānapratyaya-bhaiṣajya-pariṣkārān vā cetāpayen nissargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4198: atha khalu yasyārthāya yācati tam eva jānāpayitavyaṃ |
V05n742:4199: atha dāni vastraṃ vipraṇāmeti bhaktasya vā tarpaṇasya vā yvāgū-pānasya vā arthāya yācayitvā vaibhaṅgikaṃ dadāti |
V05n742:4200: śayyāsanam vā upasthāpeti vārṣikam vā hemantikam vā deti |
V05n742:4202: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī saṃghasya bhaktaṃ dāpeti |
V05n742:4204: yadi tahiṃ kiñcic cheṣaṃ bhavati odanam vā sūpam vā yāvad bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā upadarśayitavyaṃ |
V05n742:4215: bhikṣor api evam eva āpattis tu vinyātikramaḥ |
V05n742:4217: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glāna-[pratyaya]-bhaiṣajya [pariṣkārān vā ] cetāpayen niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4223: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ yāva pātrāṇi saṃkrāmayemaḥ |
V05n742:4224: tāyo dāni an-astamite sūrye pravṛttāḥ saṃkrāmayituṃ |
V05n742:4233: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti |
V05n742:4242: evañ ca nāma yūyaṃ pātra-sannicayaṃ karotha |
V05n742:4243: tena hi na kṣamati pātra-sannicayaṃ kartuṃ |
V05n742:4244: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:4245: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryava-dātāni bhaviṣyanti |
V05n742:4246: yā puna bhikṣuṇī pātra-sannicayaṃ kuryān niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4248: pātra-sannicayan ti pātran nāma sumbhakaṃ upa-sambhakaṃ |
V05n742:4252: sannicayaṃ kuryād iti saṃgrahaṃ kuryān nissargikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
V05n742:4260: etā(taṃ) dāni bhikṣuṇīye parimāṇaṃ baddhaṃ pātra-dhāraṇaṃ |
V05n742:4261: kiñcāpi bhikṣuḥ bahukāny api pātrāṇi vikalpetvā paribhuñjāti an-āpattiḥ |
V05n742:4263: yā puna bhikṣuṇī pātra-sannicayaṃ kuryān niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ
V05n742:4269: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ yāvac cīvarāṇi saṃkrāmemaḥ |
V05n742:4270: tāyo dāni an-astamite sūrye pravṛttāḥ saṃkrāmayituṃ |
V05n742:4280: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:4288: etaṃ dāni bhikṣuṇīye parimāṇaṃ baddhañ cīvaradhāraṇaṃ |
V05n742:4289: kiñcāpi bhikṣu bahukāni cīvarāṇi mitrāṇāṃ vikalpayitvā paribhuñjāti an-āpattiḥ |
V05n742:4295: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī cīvarāṇi naiva dhovati na sīveti na rañjeti |
V05n742:4297: upāśraye nikṣiptā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti |
V05n742:4300: ārye etāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ dhoviya sīviya phoṣiya prāvṛtā |
V05n742:4302: ānehi ārye etāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ mahyaṃ eṣā saṃghāṭī |
V05n742:4303: paśyatha āryamiśrikāyo na kiñcic chakyate upāśraye nikṣipituṃ |
V05n742:4305: dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca pragalbhā ca sā dāni tāya saṃghāṭī ācchinnā |
V05n742:4306: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:4309: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇy-upāśraye purāṇa-saṃghāṭiṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti |
V05n742:4310: uktvā paścāt svayam eva upādiyeya nissargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4317: yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti paścāt svayam eva upādīyeta niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4318: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇī-upāśraye cīvaraṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti yadi kāci upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchindituṃ |
V05n742:4320: atha dāni na kāyaci upādinnam bhavati tasyā eva ca tāya artho bhavati kiñcāpi gṛhṇāti an-āpattiḥ |
V05n742:4321: atha dāni kṣudrānukṣudrakaṃ pariṣkāraṃ nikṣiptam bhavati yadi kāyaci upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchindituṃ |
V05n742:4323: bhikṣur api bhikṣu-vihāre pātram vā cīvaram vā upānaham vā kṣudrānukṣudrakam vā pariṣkāraṃ nikṣipitvā yo icchati so upādīyatū ti |
V05n742:4324: yadi kenacid upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchincituṃ |
V05n742:4326: atha na kenacid gṛhītam bhavati so eva tenārthiko bhavati kiñcāpi gṛhṇāti an-āpattiḥ |
V05n742:4328: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇy -upāśraye purāṇa-saṃghāṭiṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti uktvā paścāt svayam eva upādīyeya niḥsargikā(ka)
V05n742:4333: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya purāṇa-saṃghāṭī omalina-malinā dhovitvā niḥsīvitvā ātape dattvā vāto ca pravāpito |
V05n742:4336: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye āroceṃti |
V05n742:4338: evan nāma tvaṃ purāṇa-saṃghāṭīṃ niḥsīvitvā na pratisa[ṃ]dhaisi na pratisandhāpayasi |
V05n742:4341: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākiya-kanyāyo mallakanyāyo lecchavi -kanyāyo su-kumārāyo bhārikāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ dhovantīyo kilamyanti |
V05n742:4342: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:4346: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīm gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:4348: yā puna bhikṣuṇī purāṇa-saṃghāṭiṃ niḥsīvitvā niḥsivāpetvā vā uttari ṣaṭ-pañca-rātram a-gilānā na pratisandhāye na pratisandhāpayena niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4354: uttarīti ṣaṭ-pañca-rātram iti na dāni ṣaṭ-pañca ca |
V05n742:4355: atha khalu paramaṃ ṣaṭ-rātran na pratisandheyaiti svayaṃ na pratisandhāpeyā ti pareṇa |
V05n742:4359: eṣā dāni bhikṣuṇīye saṃghāṭī malinā bhavati |
V05n742:4360: yadi tāva lahukā bhoti tathā yeva dhovitavyā |
V05n742:4362: atha dāni sārikā bhoti niḥsīvetvā niḥsīvitvā dhovitavyā |
V05n742:4364: sāharitvā gopiṭake vā kuṇḍake vā paṭalake vā sthāpayitvā kāṣṭha-khaṇḍena vā upala-khaṇḍena vā ākramitavyā |
V05n742:4366: atha dāni bhājanan na bhavati ekasthāne ākramiya iṣṭakena vā upala-khaṇḍena vā sthāpayitavyā |
V05n742:4367: paścād antevāsiṇīya vā samānopādhyāyinīyā vā bhikṣuṇīya pratisandhāpayitavyā svayam vā pratisandhetavyā |
V05n742:4368: atha dāni jarā-durbalā vyādhi-durbalā vā bhavati kiñcāpi cireṇa pratisandheti an-āpattiḥ |
V05n742:4370: yā puna bhikṣuṇī purāṇa-saṃghāṭīn niḥsīvitvā vā niḥsīvāpetvā vā uttari ṣaṭ-pañca-rātraṃ aglānā na pratisandhe vā na pratisandhāpeya vā niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4385: evam eva yāva sā vilakṣeti nopasampādeti |
V05n742:4386: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:4389: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śikṣamāṇām evam uktvā yadi me cīvaraṃ desi tato ham upasampādayiṣyāmīti tāye cīvaraṃ gṛhya nopasampādayen niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4394: cīvaran ti cīvaraṃ nāma kambalaṃ karpāsaṃ yāvat saṃkakṣikā |
V05n742:4396: sā taṃ cīvaraṃ gṛhṇitvā ti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī na upasampādayed iti svayan na upasampādayet niḥsargikapācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4398: eṣā tāva bhikṣuṇī śikṣyamāṇāyā cīvaraṃ gṛhṇāti |
V05n742:4401: atha dāni apratibalā bhavati jarā-durbalā vyādhi-durbalā vā anyā adhyeṣitavyā |
V05n742:4402: vaktavyā etasyā mayā cīvaraṃ gṛhītvā imām upasthāpehi |
V05n742:4403: atha sā necchati taṃ cīvaraṃ pratidātavyaṃ |
V05n742:4405: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī cīvaraṃ gṛhītvā na upasthāpeti na cīvaraṃ pratidadāti niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4409: [va]ditvā yadi me cīvararaṃ desi tato ham upasaṃpādayiṣyan ti tasyāś cīvaraṃ pratigṛhṇītvā na upasaṃpādayen niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4413: aparo dāni vāṇijako śatasahasra-mūlyaṃ kambala-ratanam ādāya uttarā pathāto āgato |
V05n742:4414: so dāni aparehi pṛcchito kim asya mūlyaṃ |
V05n742:4417: naiva rājā krīṇāti na rāja-putrāḥ na vaṇijāḥ na sārthavāhāḥ |
V05n742:4418: so dāni vāṇijako vīthīm abhiruhitvā cintā-sāgaram anupraviṣṭo āsati |
V05n742:4419: imaṃ mahārghaṃ mūlyaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ bahu-śulkaṃ na vikrāyati |
V05n742:4427: gaccha eṣā bhadrā nāma śramaṇikā sā krīṇīṣyati |
V05n742:4428: so dāni taṃ ceṭakasya skandhe āropayitvā bhikṣuṇī -vihāraṃ gatvā pṛcchati |
V05n742:4441: sā dāni na paṇeti na paṇāpeti |
V05n742:4443: gaccha sālohitaṃ jalpāhi imasya śatasahasraṃ vīthīkāto dāpehīti |
V05n742:4455: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:4460: tad eva sarvaṃ yāvad ām bhagavan |
V05n742:4462: nanu bhadre paścimā pi nāma janatā avalokayitavyā |
V05n742:4463: tena hi na kṣamati uttari catuṣkarṣeṇa guru-prāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayituṃ |
V05n742:4465: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari catuṣ-karṣeṇa guru-prāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayati ṅissargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4466: uttari catuṣ-karṣeṇeti karṣo nāma catvāraḥ purāṇāḥ |
V05n742:4470: tad uttariṃ paraṃ ṣoḍaṣehi purāṇehi cetāpayati niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4472: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī guru-prāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayitu-kāmā bhavati catuṣ-karṣa-mūlyaṃ jānāpayitavyaṃ |
V05n742:4473: pratyavaro vā tad uttariṃ na kṣamati |
V05n742:4474: atha dāni kocid ayācito avijñapto mahārgha-mūlyaṃ pi dadāti pratigṛhṇāty an-āpattiḥ |
V05n742:4476: kiñcāpi bhikṣur mahārgha-mūlyaṃ pi jānāpayitvā paribhuñjāty anāpattiḥ |
V05n742:4478: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari catu[ṣ-ka]rṣa-mūlyāto guru-prāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayen niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4492: so dāni tam ādāya bhikṣuṇī-vihāraṃ gato |
V05n742:4507: sā na svayaṃ paṇeti na paṇāpeti |
V05n742:4509: gaccha sālohitaṃ jalpāhi imasya pīṭhikāto daśa-purāṇa-sahasrāṇi dehīti |
V05n742:4510: so dāni aparehi pṛcchito vikrītaṃ te bhāṇḍaṃ |
V05n742:4519: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:4522: nanu bhadre paścimā pi nāma janatā avalokayitavyā |
V05n742:4523: tena hi na kṣamati uttari aṭā(ḍḍhā)
V05n742:4525: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
V05n742:4526: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari aḍḍhātiya-karṣa-mūlyāto sūkṣmaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayen nissargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4532: niḥsargika pācattikaṃ yāvat yā puna bhikṣuṇī sukhumaṃ cīvaraṃ jānāpayati daśa-purāṇa-mūlyaṃ jānāpayitavyaṃ |
V05n742:4535: atha dānī kocid ayācito avijñapto mahārgha-mūlyaṃ pi dadāti śatikam vā sāhasrikam vā yadi kiñcāpi paribhuñjāti an-āpattiḥ |
V05n742:4536: kiñcāpi bhikṣu śatasahasra-mūlyaṃ pi jānāpayaty an-āpattiḥ |
V05n742:4538: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari aḍḍhātiya-karṣa-mūlyāto sukhumaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayen niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ | uddānaṃ |
V05n742:4550: so dāni kāṣṭha-vāham ādāya antarāpaṇam okasto |
V05n742:4569: so dāni manuṣya paśyati yady ahaṃ dvau kārṣāpaṇā labhāmi mah'-argham mayā vikrītaṃ bhaviṣyati |
V05n742:4570: so taṃ adhikaritvā kāṣṭha-vāha-mūlyaṃ gṛhṇiya śaka[ṭa]m āruhitvā tasyāpaṇikasyāgratenopayāti |
V05n742:4588: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti yāvad bhagavān āha |
V05n742:4589: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī paropagataṃ cetāpayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4591: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya ākāravantena darśanena ākāravantena śramaṇena |
V05n742:4596: etaṃ dāni āpaṇikasya vā prāvarikasya vā kiñcid bhāṇḍam upagatam bhavati |
V05n742:4597: tena ca bhikṣuṇī arthīkā bhavati na dāni kṣamati tahiṃ antarāyayituṃ |
V05n742:4599: atha khu ekā śca sthitvā pratipālayitavyaṃ |
V05n742:4610: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīye kiñcid upakreyam bhavati pātram vā cīvaram vā na kṣamati antarā yatituṃ |
V05n742:4612: atha dāni saṃgha-madhye vaḍḍho vaḍḍhikāya jānāpayati an-āpattiḥ |
V05n742:4613: bhikṣur api paropagataṃ cetāpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
V05n742:4615: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī paropagataṃ cetāpayen nissargika-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4627: caturthaṃ ca bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pratigrahaṃ uddharitvā na jātarūpaṃ samodahet |
V05n742:4633: tatra nirdiṣṭā triṃśad daśa ca anūnāḥ kāraṇe samutpanne naiḥsargika bhagavatā nirdiṣṭā bhikṣuṇī-sūtre ||
V05n742:4636: 183. ime kho punar ārye-miśrikāyo eka-cattālaṃ śataṃ śuddhapācattikā dharmāḥ |
V05n742:4697: atha bhadrā kāpileyī antevāsinīye apratisaṃviditā saṃghāṭiṃ prāvaritvā jñāti-kulaṃ gatā |
V05n742:4703: sā dāni mārgayati ātmanaḥ saṃghāṭin na paśyati |
V05n742:4704: tāye dāni bhavati avaśyam āryāya saṃghāṭīṃ (ṭī) prāvaritā |
V05n742:4705: arhati āryā mama saṃghāṭīṃ prāvaritvā gantuṃ |
V05n742:4707: gacchatha yūyaṃ āryamiśrikāyo nāhaṃ gacchāmi kim arthaṃ |
V05n742:4715: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:4719: sā dāni śabdapitā yāvat satyaṃ bhadreti |
V05n742:4722: yāvad evan nāma tvaṃ cīvara-saṃkramaṇaṃ karoṣi |
V05n742:4724: tena hi na kṣamati cīvara-saṃkramaṇaṃ kartuṃ |
V05n742:4725: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:4727: yā puna bhikṣuṇī cīvara-saṃkramaṇaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4729: peyālaṃ cīvaran ti cīvaraṃ nāma saṃghāṭi yāvat daka-śāṭikā |
V05n742:4732: na dāni kṣamati antevāsinīye apratisaṃviditā saṃghāṭīṃ prāvarituṃ |
V05n742:4733: atha dāni prāvarati vaktavyā iyam mayā saṃghāṭī prāvaritā |
V05n742:4734: yadi praviśeṣi mama saṃghāṭīṃ prāvaritvā praviśesi |
V05n742:4738: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī saṃghāṭiṃ dhoveti vā sīveti vā raṃjeti vā |
V05n742:4739: yadi pratibalā bhavati tasyā api saṃvibhāgaṃ kartavyaṃ |
V05n742:4741: tiṣṭha tvaṃ iheva ahan tava piṇḍapāta-saṃvibhāgaṃ kariṣyāmīti |
V05n742:4745: yā puna bhikṣuṇī cīvara-saṃkramaṇaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4753: gartodaro ca gartodara-mātā ca gartodara-pitā ca āgarasyānāgariyaṃ pravrajitāḥ |
V05n742:4754: gartodara-pitā gartodaramātā ca śākyehi pravrajitā gartodaro tīrthikehi |
V05n742:4755: so dāni hasta-kambalena prāvṛto śītena khaṇakhaṇāyanto danta-vīṇikāṃ vādayanto vihāram āgato |
V05n742:4761: tāya tasya uttarāsaṅgo surabho suphoṣito dinno prāvaraṇāya |
V05n742:4762: so dāni prāvaritvā pānāgāraṃ gatvā pibanto āsati |
V05n742:4763: jano dani ojjhāyati kim eṣāṃ mithyā-dṛṣṭikānāṃ vinipatitānāṃ yāna-gardabhānāṃ surā-bhrastā (ṣṭā)
V05n742:4765: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:4774: tena hi na kṣamati āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā sva-hastaṃ śramaṇa-cīvaraṃ dātuṃ |
V05n742:4775: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:4777: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā sva-hastaṃ pramāṇa-cīvaraṃ dadyāt pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4784: na kṣamati āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā sva-hastaṃ śramaṇa-cīvaraṃ dātuṃ |
V05n742:4785: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī bhavati kṛta-puṇyā striyo dāni maṅgalārthāya dārakasya dārikāye vā kāṣāya -khaṇḍaṃ yācanti |
V05n742:4786: na kṣamati sva-hastaṃ dātuṃ kalpiya-kārikāya dātavyaṃ |
V05n742:4787: bhikṣur api āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā sva-hastaṃ śramaṇa-cīvaraṃ deti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
V05n742:4788: atha dāni bhikṣuḥ kṛtapuṇyo bhavati yāvat kalpiya-kārakeṇa dātavyaṃ |
V05n742:4792: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā sva-hastaṃ śramaṇa-cīvaraṃ dadyāt pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4800: tena hi na kṣamati kumārī-nivastena antara-gṛhaṃ praviśituṃ |
V05n742:4806: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:4808: antarvāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīya kārāpayantīya prāmāṇiko kārāpayitavyo tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ dīrghaso catvāri vitastiyo |
V05n742:4810: tiryag dve tad uttariṃ kārāpeya cchedana-pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4813: bhikṣuṇīya kārāpayantīyeti svayaṃ vā kuryāt pareṇa vā kārāpayet |
V05n742:4816: sugata-vitastinā ti tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho tasya yo vitasti so dvy-ardho mañcaka-pādo tad uttarim kārāpayed iti paraṃ pramāṇato cchedanapācattikaṃ |
V05n742:4818: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī dīrghaśo karoti pra(prā)
V05n742:4823: evaṃ tiryak karoti prāmāṇikaṃ dīrghaśo karoti atirekaṃ |
V05n742:4828: dvi-guṇaṃ māpeti udakena saṃ[ku]cati saṃkucitaṃ māpeti udakena phoṣeti śuṣkaṃ vaḍḍhiṣyatīti pācattikam āsādayati |
V05n742:4830: antarvāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīya kārāpayantīya prāmāṇikaṃ kārāpayitavyaṃ tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ |
V05n742:4834: tiryag dve tad uttariṃ kārāpeya cchedana-pācattikaṃ ||
V05n742:4839: tāye dāni pīnehi stanehi cīvaram utkṣiptaṃ |
V05n742:4841: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikāya kīdṛśaṃ cīvaram utkṣiptaṃ |
V05n742:4842: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:4847: bhikṣuṇīyo tathāgatān paṭān puṣpa-daśān saṃkakṣikāṃ kurvanti |
V05n742:4848: yāvat tena hi na kṣamati tathāgatān paṭān puṣpa-daśān saṃkakṣikāṃ kartuṃ |
V05n742:4853: saṃkakṣikāṃ bhikṣuṇīya kārāpayantīya prāmāṇikā kārāpayitavyā tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ |
V05n742:4860: bhadrā dāni kāpileyī sarpiṇikāṃ nadīṃ snānāya gatā |
V05n742:4865: sā dān āha dīrghāyuḥ gacchatha gacchatha yāvad aham uttarāmi |
V05n742:4871: dirghāyuḥ kim anena pūti-kāyena nava-dvāreṇāśuci-pragharantena dṛṣṭena |
V05n742:4876: te dāni yadā [na] gacchanti cirañ ca bhavati |
V05n742:4877: sā dāni andho bāla-jano ti kṛtvā ekaṃ hastam agrato kṛtvā aparaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā uttīrṇā |
V05n742:4878: te tāṃ vi-vasanāṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrcchitāḥ patitāḥ |
V05n742:4884: paśya bhagavan katham iya pañca licchavikumārāḥ pratibaddha-cittāḥ bhadrāyāṃ mūrcchitāḥ patitāḥ |
V05n742:4886: naitarhi yeva ete bhadrāyāṃ pratibaddha-cittāḥ mūrcchitāḥ patitāḥ |
V05n742:4887: anyadāpy ete bhadrāyāṃ pratibaddha-cittāḥ anyadāpi bhagavan anyadāpi bhikṣuṇīyo |
V05n742:4888: bhūta-pūrvaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo atītam adhvānaṃ yāvat triṃśa-bhavane |
V05n742:4889: anyata[ra]smiṃ bhavane bharaṇī nāma apsarā upapannā |
V05n742:4890: prāsādikā darśanīyā ati-r-ivānyāsām apsarāṇāṃ abhibhūya bhāsa[te] |
V05n742:4891: ati-r-ivānyāsām apsarāṇāṃ abhibhūya bhāsate tapati virājate |
V05n742:4902: yo 'tra sarva-suṣṭhu adhyavasito bhaviṣyati sa grahīṣyatīti |
V05n742:4904: utthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā āsane na labhate sukhaṃ |
V05n742:4905: śayito ca [sukhaṃ labhe] yadā kāmā jahanti mā ||[1] ||
V05n742:4907: sukhaṃ tvam asi devendra yaṃ supto labhase sukhaṃ |
V05n742:4908: bheryā saṃgrāma-śīrṣe vā sadā kāmā hananti māṃ ||[2] ||
V05n742:4910: bheryās tu hanyamānāyā bhaved vīcī muhur muhuḥ |
V05n742:4911: kāṣṭha-srotā upapannaṃ vā sadā kāmā hananti me || [3] ||
V05n742:4916: sarve bhavanto sukhitā yeṣāṃ gāthā pratibhānti |
V05n742:4917: ahaṃ khalu na jānāmi kiṃ jīvāmi marāmi vā ||[5] ||
V05n742:4922: syād vo bhikṣuṇiyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyā sā bharaṇī nāma apsarā abhūṣi |
V05n742:4925: anye te devaputrāḥ etad eva te pañca licchavi-kumārāḥ |
V05n742:4929: kasya bhagavan karmaṇo vipākena bhadrā prāsādikā darśanīyā mahā-kulīnā maheśākhyā mahābhogā kṣiprādhigamā ca |
V05n742:4930: atha khalu bhagavān bhadrāṃ kāpileyīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:4933: atha khalu bhadrā aneka-vidhaṃ pūrve-nivāsam anusmarantī bhikṣuṇīyo āmantreti |
V05n742:4934: bhūta-pūrvaṃ bhaginyaḥ atītam adhvānaṃ nagaraṃ vārāṇasī kāśī-janapado |
V05n742:4936: sā dāni anyatarāya śreṣṭhi-bhāryāya śabdāpitā keśān praśā(sā)dhanāya |
V05n742:4939: atha śuṇṭhīka nāma pratyeka-buddho piṇḍa-pātāya caranto tasmin gṛhe piṇḍāya praviṣṭo |
V05n742:4942: sā dāni strī tāṃ śreṣṭhi-bhāryāṃ āha |
V05n742:4945: kā imasyaivaṃ durvarṇasya alpeśākhyasya bhikṣān dāsyati |

V05n742:5450: api tu eṣa detha mama kiñcid vāciṣyaṃ |
V05n742:5451: sā āgārikāṃś ca parivrājakāṃś ca cikitsita-vidyāṃ vācayati |
V05n742:5455: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikam vā parivrājakam vā cikitsita-vidyāṃ vācayet pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:5460: cikitsita-vidyām iti ahi-vidyā viṣavidyā yāvad graha-caritaṃ |
V05n742:5463: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye āgārikam vā parivrājakam vā cikitsita-vidyāṃ vācayituṃ |
V05n742:5465: bhikṣur api cikitsita-vidyāṃ vācayati vinayātikramam āsādyati |
V05n742:5467: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikam vā parivrājakam vā cikitsita-vidyāṃ vācayet pācattikaṃ ||
V05n742:5471: viśākhāya dāni mṛgāramātāya ubhayato saṃgho bhaktenopa-nimantrito |
V05n742:5472: tā dāni bhikṣu[ṇī]yo kalyato yevāgatvā āhaṃsuḥ |
V05n742:5473: upāsike yaṃ dāni tvayā ubhayato saṃgho bhaktenopanimantrito kin dāni vayam upāsikāya upakāraṃ karoma |
V05n742:5479: evam etad api tu upakāraṃ kariṣyāmaḥ |
V05n742:5480: tāyo dāni talakam abhiruhitvā karpāsaṃ gṛhītvā anyāhi cikitsitaṃ |
V05n742:5488: naiṣa mama upakāro yaṃ mamārya-miśrikā piñjeyur vā loḍheyur vā vikaḍḍheyur vā karteyur vā |
V05n742:5489: eṣo mamopakāro yam āryamiśrikā matsakāśād bhuktvā uddiśatha svādhyāyetha yāvad buddhānāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyetha |
V05n742:5490: yat tāya upāsikāya avadhyāpitaṃ taṃ dāni bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ |
V05n742:5491: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:5495: tena hi na kṣamati gṛhi-vaiyāpṛtyaṃ kartuṃ | yāvat |
V05n742:5496: yā puna bhikṣuṇī gṛhi-vaiyāpṛtyaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:5499: vaiyāpṛtyam iti karteya vā piñjeya vā yāvat |
V05n742:5500: ohaneya vā pīṣeya vā paceya vā sīveya vā |
V05n742:5501: yā punar anya pi kiñcid gṛhi-vaiyāpṛtyam kuryāt pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:5507: ārya-miśrikāhi sāhāyyaṃ kartavyam iti kiñcāpi gandham vā pīṣayati |
V05n742:5509: bhikṣur api gṛhi-vaiyāpṛtyaṃ karoti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
V05n742:5511: yā puna bhikṣuṇī gṛhi-vaiyāpṛtyaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ || 4 ||
V05n742:5515: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī madhyāhne vighane aparaṃ kulam upasaṃkrāntā |
V05n742:5516: tahin dāni dve bhāryā-patikā kleṣotpīḍitā raho saṃjñino maithunaṃ pratiṣetukāmāḥ |
V05n742:5517: sā dāni apratisaṃviditā sahasā tahiṃ praviṣṭā |
V05n742:5518: so dāni manuṣyo uddhāvito utkaṇṭhito karmaṇy enāṃ rājā tena parivāteti |
V05n742:5519: imān tāvad iti-kitikāya dhītāṃ śramaṇikāṃ viṭṭālayiṣyan ti |
V05n742:5522: manāsmi ārya-miśrikāyo brahmacaryāto cyāvitā yāvad etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:5525: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī sambhojanīyaṃ kulan divā pūrve apratisaṃvicitā upasaṃkrāmasi |
V05n742:5526: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:5529: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī saṃbhojanīyaṃ kulaṃ divā pūrve apratisaṃviditā upasaṃkrameya pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:5531: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya |
V05n742:5533: yahiṃ strī-puruṣa-kaṃ sthālī-piṭharakaṃ kaṇṭikā-musalakaṃ sūpellakaṃ yava-prasthakaṃ imaṃ paścimakaṃ kulaṃ |
V05n742:5534: sambhojanīyan ti strī puruṣasya bhojanaṃ puruṣasyāpi strī bhojanaṃ |
V05n742:5535: yadi vigate madhyāhne pūrve a-pratisaṃviditā ti a-śabda-karṇikāya |
V05n742:5536: an-āhūtā upasaṃ-krameyā ti praviśet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
V05n742:5537: yaṃ dāni jñāyate etaṃ saṃbhojanīyaṃ kulan ti nahi kṣamati tahiṃ pūrve a-pratisaṃviditaṃ an-āhūtāya upasaṃkramituṃ |
V05n742:5545: yadi praviśitvā na niṣkrāmati na kṣamati praviśituṃ |
V05n742:5546: atha dāni tuṇu-tuṇā śabdo bhavati acchaṭikā dātavyā utkāśitavyaṃ vā |
V05n742:5547: yadi tāva tūṣṇīkā bhavati na kṣamati praviśituṃ |
V05n742:5548: atha dāni pratyudgacchanti svāgatam āryāyeti praviśeti praveṣṭavyaṃ |
V05n742:5549: bhikṣur api saṃvidito upasamkramati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
V05n742:5551: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī saṃbhojanīye kule divā upasaṃkrameya pūrve apratisaṃviditā an-āhūtā pācattikaṃ ||
V05n742:5555: yā dāni sā kālīyan triy'-antarā licchavi-dhītā pravrājitā |
V05n742:5556: sā dāni āgārikehi ca prāvrājakehi ca sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharati |
V05n742:5557: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:5560: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:5562: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ārāmikair vā parivrājikair vā saṃsṛṣṭā vihareya divasaṃ vā muhūrtaṃ vā antamasato ārāmika-śramaṇoddeśehi pācattikam ||
V05n742:5569: saṃsṛṣṭā vihared iti kāyikena saṃsargeṇa vācikena saṃsargeṇa |
V05n742:5571: divasam vā muhūrtam vā antamasato tat-kṣaṇan-tal-lavaṃ tan-muhūrtam vā antamasato |
V05n742:5574: śramaṇ'-uddeśā iti pañca-daśa-varṣān upādāya yāvat saptatikāḥ |
V05n742:5575: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ārāmikehi vā parivrājakehi vā saṃsṛṣṭā viharati pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:5576: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīyo anyamanyaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā hi(vi)
V05n742:5583: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ārāmikair vā parivrājikair vā sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharet divasam vā muhūrtam vā antamasato ārāmika-śramaṇ'-uddeśa-kaiḥ sārdhaṃ pācattikaṃ || 6 ||
V05n742:5587: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi sārdhaṃ kalahaṃ karoti |
V05n742:5588: sā dāni yādā parājītā bhavati tadā upasampati |
V05n742:5604: yā pi bhadrāyaṇī mām evam āha sā py evam bhavatu |
V05n742:5605: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:5610: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvad bhagavān āha |
V05n742:5611: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upaśapantī viharet ātmānaṃ sandhāya parām vā sandhāya pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:5617: yāvat sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ātmānaṃ sandhāya param vā upasa(śa)
V05n742:5621: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upaśapantī vihared ātmānaṃ vā sandhāya paraṃ vā pācattikaṃ ||
V05n742:5625: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi sārdhaṃ kalahaṃ karoti |
V05n742:5626: sā yadā parājitā bhavati tadā ātmānaṃ khaṭa-capeṭa-mustakehi piṭṭāyati |
V05n742:5629: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:5631: satyaṃ tvaṃ nande evaṃ nāma bhikṣuṇīhi sārdhaṃ kalahaṃ karoṣi |
V05n742:5636: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande naiṣa dharmo yāvat tena hi na kṣamati ātmānaṃ hanitvā rodituṃ |
V05n742:5637: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
V05n742:5638: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ātmānaṃ hanitvā rodeya pācattikaṃ ||
V05n742:5641: ātmānaṃ hanitvā ti khaṭehi vā pāṣāṇehi vā yāvad anyena vā kenacit |
V05n742:5642: roda(de)yā ti aśruṇi vā pravartayet pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:5644: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ātmānaṃ hanti na rodayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
V05n742:5646: hanati ca rodati ca pācattikam āsādayati |
V05n742:5648: bhikṣur api ātmānaṃ hanitvā rodati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
V05n742:5650: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ātmānaṃ hanitvā rodeya pācattikaṃ || 8 ||
V05n742:5654: sthūlanandāya dāni bhikṣūṇīya jetā bhikṣuṇī kulehi saṃvarṇitā |
V05n742:5655: sā jetā bhikṣuṇī bhadrikā kulāny upasaṃkramati prāsādikenātikrāntena pratikrāntenāva-lokitena vyavalokitena saṃmiṃjitena prasāritena saṃghāṭī-pātra-cīvara-dhāraṇena an-uddhatā an-unnaḍā a-capalā a-mukharā a-prakīrṇā vācā |
V05n742:5661: sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī anākalpa-sampannā anīryā-patha-sampannā omalina-malinehi cīvarehi pāṭita-vipaṭitehi vaḍḍa-ḍiṃgara-puṣṭālab(laṃb)
V05n742:5662: ehi stanehi vaḍḍehi sphicakehi uddhatā unnaḍā capalā mukharā prakīrṇā vācā |
V05n742:5663: te tasyā na gauravaṃ kurvanti na nimantrayanti |
V05n742:5665: paśyatha āryamiśrikāyo mamaivāryā jetā kulehi saṃvarṇitā mahy' evāvarṇaṃ bravīti |
V05n742:5669: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:5673: yāvad eva nāma tvaṃ duḥ-śrutena dur-avadhāritena kri(kṣi)
V05n742:5675: tena hi na kṣamati duḥ-śrutena dur-avadhāritena kṣiyā-dharmam āpadyasi |
V05n742:5676: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayasi (ti) |
V05n742:5678: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣūṇīnām evaṃ vadeya |
V05n742:5680: tato itthan-nāmāye bhikṣuṇīye bhagavaty āghāto apratyaya iti duḥ-śrutena dur-avadhāritena kṣiyā-dharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ ||
V05n742:5682: bhikṣuṇīnāṃ evam vadeyā ti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī yāvad āham ārye amukaṃ kulan ti kulan nāma kṣatriya-kulaṃ kulan nāma kṣatriya-kulaṃ brāhmaṇa-kulaṃ rājanya-kulaṃ yāni ca punar anyāni kulāni |
V05n742:5683: tato itthan-nāmāye ti yathā jetā pi bhikṣuṇīye |
V05n742:5684: bhagavaty āghāta iti na ca āghāta-vastūni asthāna-prakopa-daśamāni |
V05n742:5685: apratyaya iti duḥ-śrutena dur-avadhāriteneti na ākāravantena darśanena na ākāravantena śramaṇena kṣiyādharmam āpadyeyā ti avadhyāpeya pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:5686: yāvat prajñaptiḥ na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye duḥ-śrutena dur-avadhāritena kṣiyā-dharmam āpadyituṃ |
V05n742:5688: bhikṣur api duḥ-śrutena dur avadhāritena kṣiyā-dharmam āpadyati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
V05n742:5690: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīnām evam vadeya yadāham ārye amukaṃ kulaṃ upasamkramāmi |
V05n742:5691: tato itthan-nāmāye bhikṣuṇīye bhagavaty āghāto 'pratyaya iti duḥ-śrutena dur-avadhāritena kṣiyā-dharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ || 9 ||
V05n742:5695: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā pātra-cīvaram ādāya mahātmehi kulehi dvāra-koṣṭhakehi tiṣṭhati |
V05n742:5697: praviśantu āryāḥ praviśantu āryamiśrāḥ asmākaṃ kṛtena sidhyati |
V05n742:5698: agra-piṇḍan tāvad dattvā yuṣmākaṃ prathamānām eva paścād ātmanā paribhuñjiṣyan ti |
V05n742:5707: surā-bhrastā yānā -gardabhāḥ nagnāḥ ahrīkāḥ anotrāpiṇo mithyā-dṛṣṭikāḥ vinipatitāḥ praviśatha yuṣmākaṃ kṛtena sidhyati |
V05n742:5708: yuṣmākam agra-piṇḍan tāvad dattvā prathamānām eva paścād ātmānaṃ paribhokṣyan ti |
V05n742:5714: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:5723: duṣkṛtan te nande yāvad evan nāma tvaṃ kula-mātsaryaṃ karoṣi |
V05n742:5724: tena hi na kṣa[ma]ti kula-mātsaryaṃ karoṣi |
V05n742:5725: tena hi na kṣamati kula-mātsaryaṃ kartuṃ |
V05n742:5726: atha khalu bhagavān māhāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:5729: yā puna bhikṣuṇī kula-mātsaryaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:5731: kula-mātsaryan ti āvaraṇaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
V05n742:5734: yadi tāvad bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā pṛcchati bhūto guṇo vaktavyo |
V05n742:5735: atha dāni anya-tīrthikā pṛcchanti mā ete mithyā-dṛṣṭiṃ grāhayiṣyantīti bhṛkuṭiṃ karoti an-āpattiḥ |
V05n742:5739: yā puna bhikṣuṇī kula-mātsaryaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ | ḻṃ || uddānaṃ |
V05n742:5749: gartodaro ca gartodaramātā ca gartodara-pitā ca āgārasyānagāriyaṃ pravrajitāh | pe |
V05n742:5753: so dāni tāye kānicit pūrva-caritāni jalpati strī-utsada-dauṣṭhulyāni yāni tasyā amana-āpāni |
V05n742:5759: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
V05n742:5765: tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṃ sammukham ākrośituṃ paribhāṣituṃ |
V05n742:5767: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇī-bhikṣuṃ sammukham ākrośayed roṣayed paribhāṣayet pācattikaṃ |
V05n742:5770: ākrośayed iti a-kāra-śa-kāra-e-kāraiḥ roṣayet paribhāṣayet caṇḍālu |
V05n742:5772: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye bhikṣuṇīya bhikṣuṃ sammukham ākrośituṃ roṣituṃ paribhāṣitum |
V05n742:5774: atha bhikṣuṇyā pitā vā bhrātā jñātiko vā pravrajitako bhavati |
V05n742:5775: so ca bhavati uddhato unnaḍo asamāhito labhyā dāni so vaktuṃ |
V05n742:5779: sālohita idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā tvaṃ śikṣiṣyasi |
V05n742:5782: idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi yadā maṇḍala-dvāram anuprāpto bhaviṣyasi |
V05n742:5783: bhikṣuṇāpi bhikṣuṇīyo na kṣamati sammukham ākrośituṃ muṇḍa-strī veśya-strī ti | pe |
V05n742:5785: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṃ samukham ākrośati pācattikaṃ ||1 ||
V05n742:5789: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni eka-varṣā dvi-varṣā yāvat ṣaṭ-varṣā upasthāpenti |
V05n742:5801: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ | pe |
V05n742:5806: etad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati |
V05n742:5809: tena hi na kṣamati ūna-dvādaśodaka-varṣā[ya] upasthāpayituṃ |
V05n742:5810: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
V05n742:5811: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
V05n742:5812: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūna-dvādaśa-varṣā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ ||
V05n742:5814: ūna-dvādaśa-varṣā ti ūna-dvādaśa-varṣā nāma ūna-dvādaśodaka-varṣo ūna-dvādaśo samvatsaro ūna-dvādaśa-varṣā bhikṣuṇī |
V05n742:5816: ūna-dvādaśodaka-varṣo atireko dvādaśo samvatsaro ūna-dvādaśa-varṣā bhikṣuṇī |
V05n742:5823: akṛtāhi dvihi pravāraṇāhi upasampādeti ūna-dvādaśa-varṣā bhikṣuṇī |
V05n742:5827: hemante upasampannā tena dvādaśamena upasampādeti kṛtāyāṃ pravāraṇāyāṃ pūra-dvādaśa-varṣā bhikṣuṇī |
V05n742:5829: evaṃ purimikāyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ upasampannā kṛtāyāṃ pravāraṇāyām upasampādeti pūra-dvādaśa-varṣā bhikṣuṇī |
V05n742:5830: paścimikāyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ upasampannā tena dvādaśamena upasampādeti kṛtāhi dvihi pravāraṇāhi pūra-dvādaśa-varṣā bhikṣuṇī |
V05n742:5832: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ūna-dvādaśa-varṣā upasthāpayati pācattikaṃ pravrājayati vinayāti-kramam āsādayati |
V05n742:5833: bhikṣur api ūna-dvādaśa-varṣo upasampādayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
V05n742:5835: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūna-dvādaśa-varṣā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ ||
V05n742:5841: tena dāni kālena tena samayena ṣaḍ-vargiṇīyo bhikṣuṇīyo pūra-dvādaśa-varṣā bhavanti |
V05n742:5847: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ | pe |
